author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-4078: Allow custom naming of SolrCloud nodes so that a new host:port combination can take over for a previous shard.

msg: SOLR-4078: Allow custom naming of SolrCloud nodes so that a new host:port combination can take over for a previous shard.

author: wspeirs
msg: - QueryRunner now returns Executors which provide a fluent API for binding parameters
- Parameters are bound by name instead of position
- Unit tests updated to match changes
**Update is NOT included yet, still working on the design of the Executors
